title: Real Experience Is the Best!
detail_text: <:th_ch0105/>Nozomi-san, you’re going to show me the shrine maiden outfit today, right? I’m really looking forward to it-!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Of course! Come here, come here!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>....Huh? Why am I the one wearing it? Weren’t you going to show me you in a shrine maiden outfit, Nozomi-san....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>It’s better if you wear it than just looking♪ Fufu, it fits you, You-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>I-, is that so? Ehehe.... I’m not used to wearing a kimono, doesn’t it look weird?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>I think it suits you really well. You look stylish!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>So uhh.... Umm, can I sweep the shrine grounds wearing this?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Any help is always welcome<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Then, Nozomi-san, would you also....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>That’s true, okay, then I’ll get changed too<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Yaaay-!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
